bosco - noun [masculine] - wood, forest

gli animali del bosco: forest animals

dictionary.cambridge.org - Italian to English Dictionary, June 2024

Hi! I'm Jenn Guneratne, the New England-based photographer behind Bosco Images Wildlife Photography. I studied digital photography in the early 2010s, but wildlife photography didn't find me until more than a decade later. The journey began at the edge of the woods in my local area, capturing small animals, birds and insects.

I spend a lot of spare time during the warmer months outside, either working in my garden, or walking with my cat on his harness around the house. This allows for a lot of time to observe the wildlife that lives nearby, and a few of my current favorite shots can be attributed to my cat lazing in one place, allowing me time to quietly capture the nearby wildlife.

Each gallery here displays photos according to the orientation of your device: either landscape or portrait view. If you enjoy what you see, you can rotate the screen to see more.
